projects.name: Learn Everyday
projects.description: A quiz web app that helps students prepare for A-level examinations.

projects.name: Search GitHub Profiles
projects.description: A GitHub profile page clone. You search for a GitHub profile using a GitHub account username.

projects.name: Restaurant Review
projects.description: A progressive web app that allows users to search for a restaurant, display its location on a map and make reviews.

projects.name: Airbnb Clone
projects.description: A web app that allows users to search for an apartment and display its location on google maps using markers
